entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries late in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 30 March 2023
